name: CHEEMS The Game
description:
Minigames dedicated to the famous meme dog, CHEEMS. For fast games with the aim of exceeding the maximum score.

Games:

-CHEEMS IN THE FOREST:

Cheems is calm, enjoying the forest when suddenly an intruder arrives. Don't get cheems! Help him.

Tap the touch screen to defend Cheems and score points with each intruder chased away. Try to get the best score, help Cheems to enjoy the forest.

-HIT A CHEEMS:

Cheems has gotten out of control, let's go for him, he doesn't escape. Stop him, hit him when he shows up. Do not hit the dark Cheems, he is an impostor, just want you to lose a lot of points.

-RUNCH CHEEMS:

Cheems, you are very fast, but watch out, there are obstacles. Help Cheems dodge them, tell him when to jump. You will go away Cheems.
